role_description: An Ansible role that installs Bandwhich, a terminal bandwidth utilization tool, on almost any platform
role_description_full_overview: [Bandwhich](https://github.com/imsnif/bandwhich) is a CLI utility for displaying current network utilization by process, connection and remote IP/hostname.
role_description_alt: This repository is the home of an Ansible role that installs Bandwhich, a terminal bandwidth utilization tool, on almost any platform.
